resources.string: Welcome to Caper Cart. Swipe left or right with one finger to move through elements on the screen and double tap to activate. Swipe up then right with one finger to open speech options like volume and speed. Double tap the start shopping button to begin your shopping session.

Welcome to %1$s. Swipe left or right with one finger to move through elements on the screen and double tap to activate. Swipe up then right with one finger to open speech options like volume and speed. Double tap the start shopping button to begin your shopping session.
Includes %s earned from your current trip
We apologize, but we’re temporarily unable to check any earned {feature_name_alt_three} from before this trip.
We apologize, but we’re temporarily unable to check any earned credit from before this trip.
We apologize, but we\'re temporarily unable to check any {feature_name_alt_three}. Rest assured, you can still earn {feature_name_alt_three} on this trip.
We apologize, but we\'re temporarily unable to check any credit. Rest assured, you can still earn credit on this trip.
Clip offers while you shop to claim and earn {feature_name_alt_two} today.
Clip offers while you shop to claim and earn credit back today.
Every %1$s of {feature_name_alt_three} you earn can be used as a discount at checkout. If you’ve earned less than %2$s, it will still carry over to your next Caper trip.
Every %1$s of credit you earn can be used as a discount at checkout. If you’ve earned less than %2$s, it will still carry over to your next trip with the cart.

How to add barcode items. Header.
How to add barcode items. Header.
Your cart recognizes items you put in it.
Your cart recognizes items you put in it.

Face barcodes towards any of the cart’s 4 sensors located in each corner of the cart. The cart’s lights will turn green and a beep sound will play. This means the cart recognizes the item and you can place the item in the cart.

Face barcodes towards the cart’s barcode scanner located behind the tablet screen. The cart’s lights will turn green and a beep sound will play. This means the cart recognizes the item and you can place the item in the cart.
Don’t hold the item too close to a sensor. Please allow at least 3 inches, or the length of a credit card, between the barcode and sensor so the sensor can recognize the item.
Don’t hold the item too close to the barcode scanner. Please allow at least three inches, or the length of a credit card, between the barcode and scanner so the scanner can recognize the item.
There was an issue. Tap to resolve
Please move your cart to a flat surface.
The cart is preparing to weigh your items.
Scan your bottle deposit receipt at the checkout register to apply your credits.
This cart is out of service.

%1$sLoyalty login req. Cart credit expires within 90 days of earning. Valid on Caper Cart purchases from this retailer.%2$s %3$s
You get a %1$s discount at checkout for recently completing %2$d trips with Caper.

How to add a barcode item:

1. 	Add items one by one. 
2. 	Keep the barcode visible. 
3. 	After lights turn green, 
		place the item into the cart.

How to add a produce item:

2. 	Search for the item. 
3. 	Put it in the cart to weigh.

Upward means it needs to be raised, downward means it is raised too much and needs to be lowered. For example, left↑ means the left side needs to be raised to a higher angle

Select the weight and angle samples you will collect. Click the start button to start the collection process. \nThe car must be stable when starting, such as being unable to push, with no interference nearby, and std < 1
Please make sure you are on level ground right now.
Turn this on for recording the weight of items directly into Caper system, make sure you only turn this on for internal weight learning and turn off when finished.
Turn this on for displaying more precise weight when item is put to the cart, enable to see the expected vs detected weights for individual items.
Items weigh heavier or lighter than expected. Check that these are the correct items and no extra items were added to the cart.
